alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:58PM CDT until May 07 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clinton County in south central Illinois... Northwestern Washington County in south central Illinois... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Okawville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Okawville, Germantown, Albers, Bartelso, Damiansville, Covington, Addieville, New Minden, Venedy, Huegely, Frogtown, and Posey. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 34 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
